name: boiii
author: stefanukpadd@gmail.com
description:
Run a BOIII dedicated server.

Note: Installation slimming is enabled by default, removing the pre-installed multiplayer maps. This is to reduce the size of the server. You can disable this and have all multiplayer maps installed by default. It's recommended to keep this installed and manually add the maps you want.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Install game server - create folder to hold files
install_dir="/mnt/server"
cd /tmp
mkdir -p "${install_dir}/steamcmd"
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C "${install_dir}/steamcmd"
mkdir -p "${install_dir}/steamapps" # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd "${install_dir}/steamcmd"
./steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +force_install_dir "${install_dir}" +login anonymous +app_update 545990 validate +quit

# Install server files
cd "${install_dir}"
cp -r ./UnrankedServer/* .
curl -Ls "https://codeload.github.com/${CONFIG_F}/zip/refs/heads/main" -o main.zip
unzip -o main.zip
cp -r ./t7-server-config-main/* .
echo "Installed server config files"

# Install boiii
mkdir -p mods
curl -Ls "${BOIII}" -o "boiii.exe"
echo "Installed boiii"

# Install rcon client
curl -Ls "https://github.com/Stefanuk12/cod-rcon/releases/latest/download/cod-rcon-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz" -o cod-rcon.tar.gz
tar -xzvf cod-rcon.tar.gz -C "${install_dir}"

# Installing i4wm log server
if [ ${IW4M} == 1 ]
then
# Download the iw4m log server
curl -Ls "https://github.com/Stefanuk12/iw4m-log-server/releases/latest/download/iw4m-log-server-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz" -o main.tar.gz
tar -xzvf main.tar.gz -C "${install_dir}"
rm main.tar.gz
fi

# Cleanup
rm -r steamapps steamcmd main.zip README.md t7-server-config-main UnrankedServer cod-rcon.tar.gz
rm BOIII_CP_Server.bat BOIII_MP_Server.bat BOIII_ZM_Server.bat copydedicated.bat Launch_Server.bat

# Slimming
if [ ${SLIM_ZONE} == 1 ]
then
# Create the folders
essential_dir="${install_dir}/essential"
zone_dir="${install_dir}/zone"
mkdir -p $essential_dir

# Copy needed files over
cp -r ${zone_dir}/{*patch*,*core*,*patch*,$SERVER_CFG} $essential_dir

# Transfer files over and delete essential dir
rm -r ${zone_dir}/*
cp -r $essential_dir/* ${zone_dir}
rm -r $essential_dir
echo "Slimmed installation"
fi

# Done
echo "Done!"
